nodes.bodyText: Would be nice if all status codes could be standardized to use utils.httpStatusCodes
What happens if you repeat a valid parameter twice? Last one in? Might be good to add such a test.
Shouldn't make a difference since it exits early when params are bad.
The ask was for multiple valid parameters.
Gotcha. Misunderstood you. Adding the repeated valid params. It'l result in more and cases as part of the db filter
500 is internal server error. This should probably just be 404 not found

nodes.bodyText: You should add a test for account/0.0.5 not found returning 404. The code currently returns 500 inappropriately.
See accounts accounts-07. It does the not found and checks for a 404 appropriately. Not sure if this comment came in late.
